entries.name: level
entries.desc: Returns the leveled notifier for this object

entries.name: level_notifier
entries.desc: Returns the leveled notifier for this object

entries.name: notifiers
entries.desc: List of notifiers in the group

entries.name: new(prefix, base_notifier)
entries.desc: Create a new composite notifier object with the given prefix, and base_notifier to use for output.

entries.name: def_notifier(level, prefix = "")
entries.desc: Creates a new LeveledNotifier in the composite notifiers group.

entries.name: level_notifier=(value)
entries.desc: Sets the leveled notifier for this object.
